rules_text:
Atavistic {5}{C}{B} [i](You may cast this spell as a 7/7 colorless Eldrazi creature for {5}{C}{B}.)[/i]
Lifelink
When you cast this spell, target opponent reveals their hand. You may exile a nonland card from their hand or graveyard and pay life equal to its mana value. If you do, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
